content: un petit châle très simple et tout léger sur la même base que pampilles mais avec une bordure différente disponible ici et sur mon blog de fil en aiguille 1 gauge is not crucial for this pattern so i do not mention it the pattern is available on ravelry and on my blog de fil en aiguille 2 now in french only for english language readers you can download the english diagram 3 until i m able to publish a full translation weddy has translated the explanations for the border here 4 and yarnishness as converted the diagram for the center here 5 1 http //de-fil-en-aiguille blogspot com/ 2 http //de-fil-en-aiguille blogspot com/ 3 http //www ravelry com/dl/eclatdusoleil-designs/8418 filename=pampilles___plume_english_diagram pdf 4 http //www ravelry com/discuss/excuse-me/637885/1-25#5 5 http //www ravelry com/projects/yarnishness/plume
